titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence for the 117th Congress.
